sen.j: 伊達 吉村（だて よしむら、1680年7月23日（延宝8年6月28日 (旧暦)） - 1752年2月8日（宝暦元年12月24日 (旧暦)））は、陸奥国仙台藩の第5代藩主で、伊達氏の第21代当主。
sen.e: Yoshimura DATE (July 23, 1680-February 8, 1752) was the fifth feudal lord of the Sendai Domain in Mutsu Province, and 21st family head of the Date clan.

sen.e: His father was Munefusa DATE, the eighth son of Tadamune DATE who was the second lord of the domain (Yoshimura was the oldest son of Munefusa).

sen.j: 母は片倉景長の娘。
sen.e: His mother was the daughter of Kagenaga KATAKURA.

sen.j: 正室は久我通誠の養女・冬姫。
sen.e: His lawful wife was Fuyu-hime, the adopted daughter of Michitomo KOGA.
His lawful wife was Fuyuhime, the adopted daughter of Michitomo KOGA.

sen.j: 子は伊達村匡（長男）、伊達村風（三男）、伊達宗村 (仙台藩主)（四男・六代）、田村村隆（五男・家臣伊達村倫養子、後田村村顕養子・）、伊達村良（八男・家臣伊達宗倫養子。）、娘村姫（池田継政正室）、娘徳姫・富子（伊達村年正室・玉台院）、娘琨姫（稲葉正益正室）、娘（片倉景寛室）など。
sen.e: His children were: Muramasa DATE (the eldest son), Murakaze DATE (the third son), Munemura DATE (the fourth son and the sixth lord of domain), Murataka TAMURA (the fifth son and became the adopted son of the vassal Muranori DATE and the adopted son of Muraaki GOTAMURA), Murayoshi DATE (the eighth son and the adopted son of the vassal Munenori DATE), Murahime (daughter, the lawful wife of Tsugumasa IKEDA), Tokuhime/Tomiko (daughter, the lawful wife of Muratoshi DATE, a.k.a. Tamadaiin), 娘琨姫 (daughter, the lawful wife of Masayoshi INABA), another daughter (Kagehiro KATAKURA's lawful wife), and others.

sen.e: Since Senchiyomaru, the oldest son of Tsunamura DATE who was the fourth lord of domain, died young, Yoshimura became an adopted heir and took over as the head of the family in 1703 at the same time as the retirement of Tsunamura, his foster father.

sen.e: First of all, he obtained approval from the bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) to make 'Kanei Tsuho' (coins) in Ishinomaki and make profit by distributing them within the territory.
